faq.question: Can students afford EA maintenance in Madina?
faq.answer: Yes! Bronze plan ($99/mo) is designed to be affordable for students managing 1-2 EAs. It's an investment in protecting and optimizing your automated trading income while you study.

faq.question: Do you provide educational support for new traders?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Our monthly reports include educational insights helping you understand EA performance, optimization opportunities, and trading concepts - learning while earning.

faq.question: How fast do you respond to student queries?
faq.answer: Bronze: 48hrs, Silver: 24hrs, Gold: 12hrs. We understand students have classes and studies - we work around your schedule and respond promptly to urgent issues.

faq.question: Can you maintain EAs for side income during university?
faq.answer: Perfect use case! Many Madina students use EAs for income during studies. Our maintenance runs automatically - minimal time required from you while you focus on education.

faq.question: Do you support international student brokers?
faq.answer: Yes! Experience with 50+ international brokers. Many Madina students use international platforms - we ensure your EAs work reliably regardless of broker.

faq.question: What plan do Madina students typically choose?
faq.answer: Bronze ($99/mo) popular with students starting out. Silver ($199/mo) chosen by young entrepreneurs scaling up. Both provide excellent value for growing traders.

faq.question: Can I upgrade as my trading grows?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Start with Bronze, upgrade to Silver or Gold as your EA portfolio grows. Flexible month-to-month terms perfect for students and young entrepreneurs.
